wikipedia_page.main: David Shearer (1832 – 13 November 1891) was a minister of religion in England and Western Australia, regarded as the founder of the Presbyterian Church in that State.

response: *David Shearer (born 1957), New Zealand Leader of the Opposition and UN Deputy Special Representative to Iraq
*David Shearer (minister) (1832–1891), founder of the Presbyterian Church in Western Australia
*David Shearer (engineer) (1850–1936), inventor and agricultural implement manufacturer and steam car pioneer
David Shearer (born 1957) is a New Zealand politician and former United Nations worker.
David Shearer or Dave Shearer may also refer to:
*David Shearer (minister) (1832–1891), Scottish-born Presbyterian minister in England and Western Australia
